sentences.en: A gala dinner was held to celebrate the world premiere of the film.
sentences.cn: 为庆祝该电影在全球范围的首映举行了欢庆宴.

sentences.en: a movie premiere
sentences.cn: 电影首映式

sentences.en: A new Czechoslovak film has had its premiere at the Karlovy Vary film festival.
sentences.cn: 一部捷克斯洛伐克新电影在卡罗维发利电影节上首映。

sentences.en: Four astronauts visited for last week's premiere of the movie Space Station.
sentences.cn: 四位宇航员到场参加了上个星期举行的电影《空间站》的首映式。

sentences.en: His recent accomplishments have established him as Mexico's premiere fighter.
sentences.cn: 他最近的这些成就已经使他成为墨西哥的头牌拳手.

sentences.en: Lots of celebrities were at the film premiere.
sentences.cn: 许多名人出席了电影的首映式。

sentences.en: Premiere, a subscription channel which began in 1991, shows live football covering the top two divisions.
sentences.cn: 开播于1991年的付费电视频道premiere实况转播两大顶级足球联赛的赛事。

sentences.en: Rossini’s work had its premiere at the Paris Opera.
sentences.cn: 罗西尼的作品在巴黎歌剧院首演。

sentences.en: The 23-year-old actor was greeted by screaming fans as he arrived for the Leicester Square premiere of his new film Remember Me.
sentences.cn: 这位23岁的年轻演员，在粉丝们的热情欢呼声中到达了莱斯雷特广场，今晚是他最新电影《记住我》的首映式。

sentences.en: The documentary premiered at the Jerusalem Film Festival.
sentences.cn: 那部记录片在耶路撒冷电影节上首映。

sentences.en: The film opened with a star-studded premiere last night.
sentences.cn: 该影片昨晚举办了明星云集的首映式。

sentences.en: The performance will include the premiere of three new ballets.
sentences.cn: 三段新编芭蕾舞将在演出中首演。

sentences.en: The play had its smash premiere.
sentences.cn: 那出戏首场演出引起了极大的轰动.

sentences.en: the play’s world premiere
sentences.cn: 该戏的全球首次公演

sentences.en: The premiere on Monday is sold out.
sentences.cn: 周一首映式的门票已经全部售完。

sentences.en: The world premiere of Harold Pinter's new play casts Ian Holm in the lead role.
sentences.cn: 哈罗德·品特新剧的世界首演由伊恩·霍尔姆担纲主演。

sentences.en: the world premiere of his new play
sentences.cn: 他的新戏在全世界的首次公演

sentences.en: The world premiere took place in August 1956.
sentences.cn: 全球首映是在1956年8月。

sentences.en: We rehearsed frenziedly the last few days before the premiere.
sentences.cn: 初次公演前的那几天我们疯狂地排练.

sentences.en: We went to the premiere of their new presentation.
sentences.cn: 我们去观看了他们的新剧目的首场演出.

sentences.en: You have to know someone very important to get invited a premiere.
sentences.cn: 被邀请去参加首映式是很荣耀的.

words.tran_cn: 首位的；初次的；女主角的

trans.tran_cn: 首位的；初次的；女主角的

trans.tran_en: the first public performance of a film, play, or piece of music

trans.tran_cn: 首次公演（戏剧、音乐、电影）
trans.tran_en: When a movie or show premieres or is premiered, it is shown to an audience for the first time
